author: Trey Williams
text:
Hello everyone,
Flagstaff, AZ is looking for information on community scorecards. I wanted to know if anyone could provide examples of scorecards or dashboards that their jurisdiction has used within the last few years and how they decided what they wanted to measure along with the format they chose. Thanks!
title: Community Scorecards/Dashboard Examples and Experiences
